description.en: Brazilian couple living in the Netherlands, sharing culture, lifestyle, and travel ‚Äî full of originality, honesty, simplicity, and humor.

text.en:
We are Gabriel and Beatriz. A Brazilian couple living in the Netherlands, sharing real experiences about life in Europe ‚Äî without filters or unnecessary glamour. Euro Couple portrays everyday life, travels, challenges and joys with lightness, honesty, and humor.

Our audience connects with us and finds authenticity in what we share, treating us like everyday friends. We are grateful to have such enthusiastic and engaged followers.
